name: Starting Position
description: Standard shogi starting position. Tests opening move generation and evaluation.

name: Mid-game Tactical Position
description: Tactical position with check sequences and captures. Tests search efficiency and move ordering.

name: Mid-game Positional Position
description: Positional position with castle formations. Tests positional evaluation and long-term planning.

name: Endgame King Activity Position
description: Endgame position emphasizing king activity. Tests endgame evaluation and king safety.

name: Endgame Zugzwang Position
description: Zugzwang position where any move worsens the position. Tests deep search and zugzwang detection.
